ValidationRule.description: Makes Reason Lost Required as ERTC when an ERTC opportunity is saved with "Lost", "No Decision" or "Disqualified" then Reason Not Sold Details also required
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( NOT(BEGINS($Profile.Name, "System Admin")), CONTAINS ( $User.Job_Name__c , "Sales Representative"), ISPICKVAL( OpportunityType__c, "ERTC"), ISCHANGED( StageName), OR(ISPICKVAL( StageName ,"Lost"),ISPICKVAL( StageName ,"No Decision"), ISPICKVAL( StageName ,"Disqualified")), OR(NOT(ISPICKVAL( Reason_Not_Sold__c , "ERTC")), ISPICKVAL( Reason_Not_Sold_Details__c , "") ) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Almost there! To close out an ERTC opportunity: choose ERTC from the Reason Lost field, then choose the appropriate option from the Reason Not Sold Details dropdown and click Save.
